CONSOLE WARNING: SVG's SMIL animations (<animate>, <set>, etc.) are deprecated and will be removed. Please use CSS animations or Web animations instead.

SVG SMIL:
PASS: mode from [screen] to [lighten] was [screen] at 0
PASS: mode from [screen] to [lighten] was [screen] at 0.2
PASS: mode from [screen] to [lighten] was [lighten] at 0.6
PASS: mode from [screen] to [lighten] was [lighten] at 1

Web Animations API:
PASS: mode from [screen] to [lighten] was [screen] at -2.4
PASS: mode from [screen] to [lighten] was [screen] at 0
PASS: mode from [screen] to [lighten] was [screen] at 0.2
PASS: mode from [screen] to [lighten] was [lighten] at 0.6
PASS: mode from [screen] to [lighten] was [lighten] at 1
PASS: mode from [screen] to [lighten] was [lighten] at 3.4
